message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested but $110 is a bit steep for me. How about $105?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal, if you ask me!
